name: Safari Wild Dino Hunting
description:
This jungle dinosaur game is extremely realistic having models of terrifying dinos with their realistic animations which make sense of realism of dinosaurs. Dinos are really smarter and can vanished you if you loose you aiming and shooting skills so ready you weapons and Just play and play game untill having recieve enough coins to buy more powerful guns like shotgun and sniper to use them for having thrilled acion shooting scenerio in this Safari Wild Dino Hunting.

You are hero survivor trapped in huge Jurassic forest now you have to stay alive among deadly dinosaurs blood thirsty hunting beasts, so vanished them all and be the winner in this safari prey and hunting jungles.

Features:
Multiple optimized guns and snipers
Thrilling missions and different dinosaurs model
Ultimate crazy safari combat battle
Smooth interface and stunning back music
Full exciting action killing adventure
